T02TD2907E:297b-1: badzra bi d'a ra na mandal bi dhi n'a ma /
T02TD2907E:297b-3: rdo rje rnam par 'joms ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD2907E:297b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2907E:297b-5: rdo rje kun dge 'joms mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2907E:297b-6: dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad par bya //
T02TD2907E:297b-7: dang por bdag stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02TD2907E:297b-8: aom sho dan te sho dan ye sv'a h'a //
T02TD2907E:297b-9: zhes dbang po'i sgo dag pa'i khrus byas te /
T02TD2907E:297b-10: chos thams cad stong pa nid nang gi bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la /
T02TD2907E:297b-11: bdag nyid skad cig mas ltar bskyed la /
T02TD2907E:297b-14: gri hn'a pa ya gri h'um a'a na ya ho: bha ga b'an bidy'a r'a dz'a ya h'um phat /
T02TD2907E:297b-15: mi 'gro ba rnams la mtshon cha'i char dbab pa ste /
T02TD2907E:297b-17: h'um bh'um t'am bh'um hr'i: bh'um /
T02TD2907E:297b-19: de nas mtshon cha lnga'i gur dang sa gzhir gyur to //
T02TD2907E:297b-20: mtshams kyi khang ba'i nang du /
T02TD2907E:297b-21: tsakra ga tsa la manda la ma ye zhes /
T02TD2907E:297b-22: tshogs bsags pa rten gyi dkyil 'khor mdun du sbrul la /
T02TD2907E:297b-23: phyi dang nang gi mchod pas mchod //
T02TD2907E:297b-24: rdo rje me'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i rdzas rnam bsregs la /
T02TD2907E:297b-25: badzra dhva ti dzva la ram h'um zhes pa'o //
T02TD2907E:297b-26: dam tshig phyag rgyas sprul te /
T02TD2907E:297b-28: phra bar satk'a ra pra t'i tstsha h'um /
T02TD2907E:297b-30: pu shpe tra'm a'a lo ke hri': gandhe aa: nee bi dye h'um:/
T02TD2907E:297b-31: dbul ba las kyi phyag rgyas dbul /
T02TD2907E:298a-2: khrus kyi dam pa yon chab 'di //
T02TD2907E:298a-4: 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:298a-5: aom ga nas ma ye h'um /
T02TD2907E:298a-6: dag cing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi //
T02TD2907E:298a-7: lha rdzas dam pa'i khrus chab 'di //
T02TD2907E:298a-9: 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:298a-10: aom pra ba ra satk'a ra pra t'itstsha ho //
T02TD2907E:298a-11: h'um nags tshal bcud ni yi gar 'ong /
T02TD2907E:298a-12: dri mchog rgyas pa'i spos me 'di //
T02TD2907E:298a-14: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:298a-15: aom na ma: badzra bi d'a rana dh'u pa p'u dza me gha sa mu dra spa ra na sa ma ye h'um //
T02TD2907E:298a-16: chu'am thang las skyes pa yi //
T02TD2907E:298a-17: kha dog dbyibs legs me tog 'di //
T02TD2907E:298a-19: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:298a-20: aom na ma: badzra bi d'a ra na pushpa /
T02TD2907E:298a-21: gdon rnams 'joms shing bkra shis pa'i //
T02TD2907E:298a-22: dge zhing mun sel snang gsal 'di //
T02TD2907E:298a-24: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:298a-26: 'chal pa'i dri ma sel mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2907E:298a-27: yid bzhin bdud rtsi mtsho ltar bskyil //
T02TD2907E:298a-29: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:298a-31: dag cing gtsang mar sbyar ba yi//
T02TD2907E:298a-32: lha rdzas dam pa'i zhal zas 'di //
T02TD2907E:298a-33: bcom ldan ldan rnam 'joms 'khor bcas la //
T02TD2907E:298a-34: dad pas dbul lo bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:298a-36: de las gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02TD2907E:298a-37: rol mo sgra snyan yid 'ong ba /
T02TD2907E:298a-38: sems can sdug bsngal tshim mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2907E:298a-39: dus rnams kun du rgyas gyur cig / aom na ma: bi d'a ra na badzra ghande rani p'u dza me gha sa mu dra na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2907E:298a-40: nang gi mchod pa 'bul ba yang /
T02TD2907E:298a-41: bdun ni rnam dag byang chub sems //
T02TD2907E:298a-42: bsod nams tshogs chen bsags par bya /
T02TD2907E:298a-43: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la /
T02TD2907E:298a-45: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i mgon po khyed rnams kyis /
T02TD2907E:298a-46: bdag dus thams cad du bzhes su gsol lo //
T02TD2907E:298a-47: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yi //
T02TD2907E:298a-48: dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bsags pa //
T02TD2907E:298a-49: thams cad ma lus bsdus nas ni //
T02TD2907E:298a-50: dge rtsa byang chub chen po bsdo //
T02TD2907E:298a-51: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yi //
T02TD2907E:298b-0: byang chub tu ni nges @298b mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2907E:298b-1: byang chub sems ni bla med pa'i //
T02TD2907E:298b-2: dam pa bdag gis bskyed bar bgyi //
T02TD2907E:298b-3: dkon mchog bla ma dam pa'i chos //
T02TD2907E:298b-4: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang //
T02TD2907E:298b-5: sems bskyed sdom pa lnga rnams ni //
T02TD2907E:298b-6: rigs lnga'i dam tshig sdom pa bzung //
T02TD2907E:298b-7: ma grol ba rnams grol bar bgyi //
T02TD2907E:298b-8: ma brgal ba ni bsgral bar bgyi //
T02TD2907E:298b-9: dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs phung ste /
T02TD2907E:298b-10: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02TD2907E:298b-11: des ni bla na med pa sems kyi mchod pa'o //
T02TD2907E:298b-12: badzra aa nydza li sar sdom pa /
T02TD2907E:298b-13: badzra bandha trat ces sdig pa dral /
T02TD2907E:298b-14: badzra a'a be sha aa: aa: zhes ye shes dbab pa brtan pa badzra mushti bam zhes pa /
T02TD2907E:298b-15: sdig sgrib dral zhing ye shes dbab pa ni //
T02TD2907E:298b-16: ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa ste /
T02TD2907E:298b-17: de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'o //
T02TD2907E:298b-18: mchod pa lnga yis tshogs gnyis rdzogs //
T02TD2907E:298b-19: srung 'khor bsdus la nam mkhar gnas /
T02TD2907E:298b-20: sarba bidy'a badzra zhes brjod pas //
T02TD2907E:298b-21: rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad kun //
T02TD2907E:298b-22: stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya /
T02TD2907E:298b-23: sems nyid aa yi rang bzhin las //
T02TD2907E:298b-24: skye ba'i cho 'phrul yam du shar /
T02TD2907E:298b-25: sngon po gzhu yi dbyibs lta bu //
T02TD2907E:298b-26: de steng bam las chu chen ni //
T02TD2907E:298b-27: zlum la dkar po bsil ba ste /
T02TD2907E:298b-28: sum las sa gzhi ri rab bskyed //
T02TD2907E:298b-29: bh'um las rin chen gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2907E:298b-30: gdan gsum ldan pa'i steng dag tu //
T02TD2907E:298b-31: aa ni h'um du gyur pa las //
T02TD2907E:298b-32: 'od zer spro bsdus lan gnyis byas //
T02TD2907E:298b-33: rdo rje rtse lnga padma'i dbus //
T02TD2907E:298b-34: de las spros dang bsdus pa yis //
T02TD2907E:298b-35: spho ta badzra'i sngags brjod pas //
T02TD2907E:298b-37: sngon po spug gi kha dog la //
T02TD2907E:298b-38: g-yas pa rgya gram 'dzin pa ste //
T02TD2907E:298b-39: g-yon na sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsgreng /
T02TD2907E:298b-40: khro las byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan //
T02TD2907E:298b-41: cha lugs brgyad dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2907E:298b-42: thugs las h'um bzhi phyogs bzhir chad //
T02TD2907E:298b-43: gri gug nyi zla'i rtsibs stengs su //
T02TD2907E:298b-44: 'jigs pa'i khor bo chen po bzhi //
T02TD2907E:298b-45: ma nor rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskyed //
T02TD2907E:298b-46: shar du rdo rje gtum po ni //
T02TD2907E:298b-47: smug nag rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams //
T02TD2907E:298b-48: lho ru rdo rje phur bu ni//
T02TD2907E:298b-49: ljang nag rdo rje phur pa bsnams //
T02TD2907E:298b-50: nub tu rdo rje be con ni //
T02TD2907E:298b-51: dmar nag phyag na be con bsnams//
T02TD2907E:298b-52: byang du rdo rje thob ni //
T02TD2907E:298b-53: ljang nag phyag na tho ba bsnams //
T02TD2907E:298b-54: g-yon pa kun ni sdigs mdzub ste //
T02TD2907E:298b-55: khro las byang chub sems dpa' brgyan //
T02TD2907E:298b-56: 'khor lo'i gong ras bzhi la ni //
T02TD2907E:299a-2: padma sna tshogs rdo rje las /
T02TD2907E:299a-3: sphot badzra badzra s'a sye h'um zhes brjod bas /
T02TD2907E:299a-4: l'a sye dkar mo phyag na me long bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-6: m'a le sngon mo phyag na phreng ba bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-7: badzra g'i rti hr'i: g'i rti dmar mo phyag na pi wang bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-8: badzra nri tye aa:nri tye aa:ljang gu gar bsgyur thal sbyar spyi //
T02TD2907E:299a-9: phyi rim rgyas ba'i gru chad la //
T02TD2907E:299a-10: phyag rgya gser dngul zang lcags gzhong pa bzhi //
T02TD2907E:299a-11: mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi po bskyed //
T02TD2907E:299a-12: dh'a pe dkar mo spos gzhong ser mo bshams /
T02TD2907E:299a-14: pushpe ser mo me tog gzhong pa bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-15: badzra pu shpe tr'am mar me dmar skya me gzhong dmar po bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-16: badzra a'a lo ke hr'i: dri chab ljang gu lcags kyi gzhong pa bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-17: badzra gandhe aa: khyams la phyogs skyong bcu po bskyed //
T02TD2907E:299a-18: rdo rje thab gru gsum dang //
T02TD2907E:299a-19: be con ral gri sbrul zhags dang //
T02TD2907E:299a-20: ba dan dbyug pa kha nv'am ga / shar du nyi zla nub tu bum pa las //
T02TD2907E:299a-21: sngags 'di brjod la sku ru gsal bar bskyed //
T02TD2907E:299a-23: brgya byin dkar po phyag na rdo rje bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-25: aa gne dmar ser phyag na me thab bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-27: gshin rje nag po phyag na be con bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-29: bden bral dmar ser phyag na ral gri bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-31: chu lha dmar po phyag na sbrul zhags bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-33: rlung lha dmar ljang phag na ba dan bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-34: ku ba ra ya sv'a h'a //
T02TD2907E:299a-35: gnod sbyin ljang gu phyag na dbyug to thogs /
T02TD2907E:299a-36: ai shva na ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2907E:299a-37: dbang ldan ljang skya phyag na kha tv'am ga //
T02TD2907E:299a-39: tshangs pa sngo skya phyag na nyi zla bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-40: pra ti bhya ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2907E:299a-41: sa bdag mthing nag phyag na bum pa bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-42: dregs pa sems can kun gyi gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD2907E:299a-43: sgo bzhir phyag rgya lcags kyu dang //
T02TD2907E:299a-44: zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu las //
T02TD2907E:299a-45: shar du yang ku sha dza:/
T02TD2907E:299a-46: rta gdong dkar mo phyag na lcags kyu bsnams //
T02TD2907E:299a-48: phag gdong nag mo mche zhags thogs pa'o //
T02TD2907E:299a-49: nub sgor spo ta bam las //
T02TD2907E:299a-50: nyi zla dmar mo lcags sgrog bsnams par bsgom mo //
T02TD2907E:299a-51: byang sgor a'a be sha aa: las /
T02TD2907E:299a-52: thal byed ljang nag dril bu 'khrol bar bskyed do //
T02TD2907E:299b-0: yang na khyams su bkra shis kyi lha mo brgyad @299b phyag mtshan brgyad las sku mdog ser mo phyag na bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad bsnams pa bskyed do //
T02TD2907E:299b-11: dang po rdo rje ra ba la phyogs skyong bskyed //
T02TD2907E:299b-12: padma la lha srin sde brgyad bskyed /
T02TD2907E:299b-13: me 'od la bgegs rigs stong phrag brgyad cu bskyed do //
T02TD2907E:299b-16: bskyed pa'i lha nyi shu rtsa lnga /
T02TD2907E:299b-17: mchod pa'i lha stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa lnga'o //
T02TD2907E:299b-18: rtsa ba'i sngags brjod la phyag rgya bstan //
T02TD2907E:299b-19: snying po ti lnga dbu stengs su //
T02TD2907E:299b-20: sangs rgyas lnga yis dbang bskur ba //
T02TD2907E:299b-21: ka ta badzra zhes brjod pas //
T02TD2907E:299b-22: spyi bor dbang bskur byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD2907E:299b-23: bskyed pa'i lha rnams ku la ni //
T02TD2907E:299b-24: rigs kyi bdag po re re bsgom //
T02TD2907E:299b-25: dbang bskur lha rnams tham cad la /
T02TD2907E:299b-26: ma ta badzra zhes brjod pa //
T02TD2907E:299b-27: lus la rdo rje gos gyon no //
T02TD2907E:299b-28: ma tha mi 'gyur ka nan btang//
T02TD2907E:299b-29: aa tha zhes ni bgegs kyang bskrad //
T02TD2907E:299b-30: su las rdo rje khang pa ni //
T02TD2907E:299b-31: rab tu brtan par 'gyur ba dang //
T02TD2907E:299b-32: gzhi yi rnam 'byor lus rnams ni //
T02TD2907E:299b-33: badzra bdun gyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2907E:299b-34: rang bzhin gnas nas bskul ba ni //
T02TD2907E:299b-35: ha ra ha ra badzra bi d'a ra /
T02TD2907E:299b-36: se gol drag tu brdabs pa yi //
T02TD2907E:299b-37: dza:yi sprul pas snyan gsan dbab //
T02TD2907E:299b-38: bra ha ra bra ha ra badzra pra bha nydza dza:h'um bam ho:/
T02TD2907E:299b-39: 'od zer lnga yi mdun du byon //
T02TD2907E:299b-41: de yis lha rnams cha gnyis dbye /
T02TD2907E:299b-43: gdan gcig mi gnyis tshul du gcod /
T02TD2907E:299b-45: de rnams gnyis med 'dres par bstim //
T02TD2907E:299b-47: aa bra ti ha ta badzra gsung brtan //
T02TD2907E:299b-48: aa mo gha badzra thugs brtan //
T02TD2907E:299b-49: ae hye hi badzra dgyes pa bskyed /
T02TD2907E:299b-50: sh'i gh'am badzra dngos grub ma thob par du bzhugs //
T02TD2907E:299b-51: dam tshig lha dang ye shes lha //
T02TD2907E:299b-52: gnyis med bsgrubs la mchod pas mchod //
T02TD2907E:299b-53: bsgom zhing bzlas pas bsgrub par bya //
T02TD2907E:299b-54: sngags rings nye ba'i snying po gnyis //
T02TD2907E:299b-55: bsdus rgyas lha yi bsnyen pa bskyal //
T02TD2907E:299b-56: mtshan ma dus dang grangs la sogs //
T02TD2907E:299b-57: dam du bcas pa'i bsnyen pa ni //
T02TD2907E:299b-58: thun bzhi rim gyis nyin dang mtshan //
T02TD2907E:299b-59: bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i cho ga bya /
T02TD2907E:299b-60: dkyil 'khor zhag gi cho ga la /
T02TD2907E:299b-61: sa dang sta gon rdul tshon rnams //
T02TD2907E:299b-62: mkhas pas rim par brtsam par bya //
T02TD2907E:300a-0: @300a * // dang pos yi cho ga ni //
T02TD2907E:300a-1: sa brtag bslang zhing sbyang ba dang //
T02TD2907E:300a-2: byin gyis brlab cing gzung ba lnga //
T02TD2907E:300a-3: sa brtag pa la bzhi ru grangs /
T02TD2907E:300a-4: rnam mkha'i phyos dang sa gzhi dang /
T02TD2907E:300a-5: bdag po yod med brtag pa bzhi //
T02TD2907E:300a-6: sa sbyangs pa la gnyis yin te /
T02TD2907E:300a-7: mngon pa mi la nyo bslang dang //
T02TD2907E:300a-8: mi mngon bgegs la bslang ba'o //
T02TD2907E:300a-9: bden pa bdar te chos bshad bslang ba dang /
T02TD2907E:300a-10: mchod cing gsol ba gdab ste bslang ba'o //
T02TD2907E:300a-11: skyob ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das /
T02TD2907E:300a-12: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02TD2907E:300a-13: sa dang pha rol phyin pa yi //
T02TD2907E:300a-14: lha mo khod ni dbang du gyur //
T02TD2907E:300a-15: ji ltar sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02TD2907E:300a-16: bdud sde dpung bcas bcom pa bzhin //
T02TD2907E:300a-17: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni //
T02TD2907E:300a-18: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD2907E:300a-19: zhes rdo rje brdabs pas sa'i ser ka nas /
T02TD2907E:300a-20: sa'i lha mo byon te sa gnang ngo //
T02TD2907E:300a-21: sa'i lha mo dang sa bdag gnas kyi bdag po la mchod pa dang gtor mas mchod nas /
T02TD2907E:300a-22: h'um gang yang sa la gnas pa dang //
T02TD2907E:300a-23: sa la rgyu ba'i lha klu rnams /
T02TD2907E:300a-24: mchod dang gtor ma 'di long la //
T02TD2907E:300a-25: sems can kun la dge don du /
T02TD2907E:300a-26: byams pa'i sems kyis gnang bar mdzod //
T02TD2907E:300a-27: bra ti bya dh'u pam pu sham /
T02TD2907E:300a-28: a'a lo ke gandhe nee bi dye p'u dz ma gha sa mu dras par na sa ma ye h'um /
T02TD2907E:300a-29: pra ti bya nam sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo bi shva mukhey bhya:sarba ta tkham aut kham ba lim ta kh'a hi //
T02TD2907E:300a-31: las dang bya bas sbyang ba dang //
T02TD2907E:300a-32: sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang ba'o //
T02TD2907E:300a-33: chos nyid stong pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas stong bar sbyang ba'o //
T02TD2907E:300a-34: las dang bya bas brkos te ro lnga bsal //
T02TD2907E:300a-35: 'thas shing tshad dang ldan par bya //
T02TD2907E:300a-36: tshangs thig zur thig pa bzhi gdab //
T02TD2907E:300a-37: cha chen bcu drug bgo byas la /
T02TD2907E:300a-38: lha snam min pa bzhi bzhir bgo //
T02TD2907E:300a-39: zlum skar rim pa brgyad du bskor //
T02TD2907E:300a-40: pho brang 'khor lo'i gong ras la //
T02TD2907E:300a-41: rim pa gnyis gnyis gzhi ru bskor //
T02TD2907E:300a-43: cha bran gnyis gnyis mnyam po ru //
T02TD2907E:300a-44: rim pa bzhin du bskor te gzhag / thing ka dkar po ser le brgan //
T02TD2907E:300a-45: ljang gu la sogs panytsa btang //
T02TD2907E:300a-46: yang na mthing ga dkar po dang //
T02TD2907E:300a-47: dmar po sku gsum tri r'ag //
T02TD2907E:300a-48: gong ras ljang gu gru chad ser //
T02TD2907E:300a-49: sgo dang lha snam phyogs tshon la //
T02TD2907E:300a-50: lnga rtse dmar po pha gu ser //
T02TD2907E:300b-0: dra ba dkar la @300b chun 'phyang lcags //
T02TD2907E:300b-1: dkyil 'khor steng du sku gzugs bzhag / sa des sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs kyis gzung ba'o /
T02TD2907E:300b-2: bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i bum pa gzhag pa ni //
T02TD2907E:300b-3: khro bo las thams cad pas sa gzung ba'o //
T02TD2907E:300b-4: gnyis pa sta gon gnas par bya //
T02TD2907E:300b-5: lha dang bum pa slob ma dang //
T02TD2907E:300b-6: sta gon dus kyi sbyin sreg go //
T02TD2907E:300b-7: dkyil 'khor lha yi gnas rnams su //
T02TD2907E:300b-8: tsandan gur gum dir yi thig le bya //
T02TD2907E:300b-9: rang rang sngags kyis skad cig bskyed //
T02TD2907E:300b-10: de las mchod dang gtor ma dang /
T02TD2907E:300b-11: gsang ba sder bzangs mchod pa dbul //
T02TD2907E:300b-12: mchod de gsol ba gdab pa ni /
T02TD2907E:300b-13: bcom ldan rdo rje rnam 'joms ni //
T02TD2907E:300b-14: rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:300b-15: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa dang //
T02TD2907E:300b-16: sems can kun la brtse don du //
T02TD2907E:300b-18: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
T02TD2907E:300b-19: tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD2907E:300b-20: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2907E:300b-21: zhes pa lan gsum du gsol ba gdab po //
T02TD2907E:300b-22: bum pa sta gon du gnas pa ni /
T02TD2907E:300b-23: bum pa'i rgyu bstan pa dang /
T02TD2907E:300b-24: bum pa'i bcud bstan pa dang /
T02TD2907E:300b-27: bca' ba'i thabs bstan pa dang /
T02TD2907E:300b-28: bzlas pa'i grangs bstan pa dang /
T02TD2907E:300b-31: bum pa'i grangs ni bsdus pa drug ste /
T02TD2907E:300b-32: dbang bskur ba'i bum pa lnga /
T02TD2907E:300b-33: bud rtsi 'khyil ba'i bum pa dang drug go //
T02TD2907E:300b-34: rigs kyi mtshan ma ni gur gum gyis ti lnga bri //
T02TD2907E:300b-35: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la h'um bri //
T02TD2907E:300b-36: kha dog mthing ser dmar ljang ngo //
T02TD2907E:300b-37: bdud rtsi spug gi kha dog can du bya'o //
T02TD2907E:300b-38: bam las bum pa gzhal yas khang //
T02TD2907E:300b-39: bam las bdud rtsi'i gzhal yas bskyed //
T02TD2907E:300b-40: rgya mtsho padma'i gang na stengs su //
T02TD2907E:300b-41: ti dang ya yig h'um las ni //
T02TD2907E:300b-42: lha bskyed spyan drangs mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:300b-43: nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa ni //
T02TD2907E:300b-44: bum pa re la rdzogs par bya //
T02TD2907E:300b-45: yungs kar re la sngags re btab //
T02TD2907E:300b-46: des ni bum pa'i sta gon no //
T02TD2907E:300b-47: de nas slob ma lha par gnas pa ni //
T02TD2907E:300b-48: de la dang po khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon zhing /
T02TD2907E:300b-49: lag na me tog thogs la /
T02TD2907E:300b-50: slob dpon lha la phyag byas la 'di skad zhu'o //
T02TD2907E:300b-51: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa pas //
T02TD2907E:301a-0: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su @301a * //
T02TD2907E:301a-2: byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2907E:301a-3: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2907E:301a-4: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02TD2907E:301a-5: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD2907E:301a-6: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02TD2907E:301a-7: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02TD2907E:301a-8: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi //
T02TD2907E:301a-9: de nas slob dpon gyis spro ba bskyed la /
T02TD2907E:301a-10: ho rtog pa rnams ni legs par bsdus nas su //
T02TD2907E:301a-11: shin tu bsam pa bzang dang ldan pas nyon /
T02TD2907E:301a-12: brjed ngas blo la rdo rje rnam 'joms pa'i //
T02TD2907E:301a-13: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob //
T02TD2907E:301a-14: de nas slob mas sdig pa bshags pa /
T02TD2907E:301a-15: dbang med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang //
T02TD2907E:301a-16: rjes su yi rang yang na bgyid stsal gang //
T02TD2907E:301a-17: de dag thams cad byang chub mchog chen gyi //
T02TD2907E:301a-18: spyan sngar sdig pa ma lus so sor bshags //
T02TD2907E:301a-19: zhes lan gsum du brjod do //
T02TD2907E:301a-20: bdag gis sems can don du ni //
T02TD2907E:301a-21: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya /
T02TD2907E:301a-22: sdug bsngal gru las thar pa'i phyir //
T02TD2907E:301a-23: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02TD2907E:301a-24: slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje rgya gram bcug la /
T02TD2907E:301a-25: na ma: tsanda badzra kro dha k'i li k'i l'a ya /
T02TD2907E:301a-26: zhes brjod la slob ma rdo rje rnam par bskyed la //
T02TD2907E:301a-27: h'um hr'am hr'i: aa: zhes pas gnas bzhi byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2907E:301a-28: rdo rje bsdams pa'i phyag rgyas snying gar h'um las rdo rje /
T02TD2907E:301a-29: dpral bar tr'am las rin po che /
T02TD2907E:301a-31: spyi bor aa: las sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed do //
T02TD2907E:301a-32: de ltar gnas bzhir ye shes bzhi rtags dang ldan par byin gyis brlabs nas mchod pa dbul zhing snang bar byas te /
T02TD2907E:301a-35: dri thugs kar byug / mar me snang par bstan //
T02TD2907E:301a-36: lha bshos zhal du bcug / sil snyan rna bar bsgrags /
T02TD2907E:301a-37: sngags dang phyag rgyas tshig rnams go bar brjod do //
T02TD2907E:301a-38: aa shvattha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mo me tog bcings ba de badzra h'a sa ha zhes sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2907E:301a-39: ku sha sngon po badzra tri nytsa zhes gtdad la /
T02TD2907E:301a-40: la la sngas su gzhug la la stan du bting ba la nyol cig bsgo'o //
T02TD2907E:301a-41: di nas rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas pa'i srung skud mgul du gdags so //
T02TD2907E:301b-0: nang par bzhin bzangs longs shig / dkyil 'khor @301b chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
T02TD2907E:301b-1: lha gnas slob ma sta gon gyi cho ga'o //
T02TD2907E:301b-3: badzra drishti mata ces nam mkha' la bteg la thig gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2907E:301b-4: gzhung dang mthun par bris nas ni //
T02TD2907E:301b-5: dkyil 'khor nam mkhar bslang bar bya ste //
T02TD2907E:301b-6: rdo rje rgya gram phyag rgyas /
T02TD2907E:301b-7: badzra pe ga kra ma h'u zhes gdeg par bya'o //
T02TD2907E:301b-8: phyag mtshan la sta gon gyi ye shes dbang ste /
T02TD2907E:301b-15: zhes sgo ba 'bebs pa'i bar du dbab par bya'o //
T02TD2907E:301b-16: dkyil 'khor byin dang ldan pa'i phyir /
T02TD2907E:301b-17: rdo rje gzungs kyis bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2907E:301b-18: bdag rdo rje rnam par 'joms par bsgoms la /
T02TD2907E:301b-19: gzungs tshar nyi shu rtsa gcig bton pas /
T02TD2907E:301b-20: kun kyang rdo rje'i gur dang sa gzhir gyur te /
T02TD2907E:301b-21: mtshams bcad cing bar chad med par bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD2907E:301b-22: lhag chad kyi nyes pa kha bskang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2907E:301b-23: rdo rje shugs kyis bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2907E:301b-24: rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa bzlas shing /
T02TD2907E:301b-25: dril bu dkrol zhing lan bdun du dkyil 'khor la bskor ba bya'o //
T02TD2907E:301b-26: rdo rje shugs ni dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg te bskor ba byas pas /
T02TD2907E:301b-27: cho ga lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa dang /
T02TD2907E:301b-28: ma 'byor ba'i cho ga nyams pa thams cad sor chud par 'gyur ro //
T02TD2907E:301b-29: rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pa thams cad gsung yin /
T02TD2907E:301b-30: lha thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gsal ba thugs /
T02TD2907E:301b-31: de las sku gsal ba dbyer med du gyur par bsgom mo //
T02TD2907E:301b-32: dkyil 'khor gyi gdan thog tu phyag mtshan phab pa de rnams la /
T02TD2907E:301b-33: nama:tsanda badzra kro h'a k'i li k'i l'a ya zhes brjod pa gsung /
T02TD2907E:301b-34: rdo rje rgya gram du gsal pa de thugs /
T02TD2907E:301b-35: de las 'od zer 'phro 'du byas te skur dkrongs tser song ba de gsum dbyer med pa de dag sku gsung tha mi dad par bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD2907E:301b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi lha ye shes lha'i bdag nyid can du bsgrub pa'i chos brgyad de /
T02TD2907E:301b-37: rdo rje slob dpon gyis se gol brngab cing /
T02TD2907E:301b-38: badzra sa ma ya dza: h'um bam ho: zhes rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drang ngo //
T02TD2907E:301b-39: badzra gandhe pra be sha phat /
T02TD2907E:301b-41: badzra aam ku sha dza: phyi nas nang du spyan drang /
T02TD2907E:302a-2: badzra spho ta bam gnyis med pa stim /
T02TD2907E:302a-3: a'a be sha aa: zhes dgyes pa bskyed /
T02TD2907E:302a-4: badzra aa mri ta kunda li sarba bi gha n'am n'a sha ya h'um phat /
T02TD2907E:302a-6: badzras sandhi bam gyis sgo bcad do //
T02TD2907E:302a-7: yi ge gnyis kyis lha thams cad la rdo rje ka nan gtang /
T02TD2907E:302a-8: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab bar bya ste /
T02TD2907E:302a-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te /
T02TD2907E:302a-10: aom badzra tsant dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2907E:302a-13: aom bdzra tsanda badzra tsanda ti /
T02TD2907E:302a-14: rtsa ba'i lha'i snying po mthun te lnga'o //
T02TD2907E:302a-17: g'i ti hr'i: nri tye aa: aom badzra dh'u pa h'um /
T02TD2907E:302a-19: a'a lo ke hr'i: gandhe aa: aom badzra siddham /
T02TD2907E:302a-26: bkra shis lha mo brgyad ni phyag thal mo gzings pa'o //
T02TD2907E:302a-27: aom badzra aam ku sha dza: aom badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02TD2907E:302a-28: aom badzra spo ta pam a'a badzra a'a pe sha aa: zhes dam tshig phyag rgya'o //
T02TD2907E:302a-30: lha thams cad kyi ljags la badzra dharma dzny'a na zhes bsgom mo //
T02TD2907E:302a-34: g-yon sdigs mdzub thugs ka ra bsgreng ba'o //
T02TD2907E:302a-36: sems can thams cad bsrung ba'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2907E:302a-37: rdo rje gtum pos zhi ba'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2907E:302a-38: rdo rje phur bus rgyas pa'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2907E:302a-39: rdo rje be con gyis dbang gi las mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2907E:302a-40: rdo rje tho bas sems can thams cad rengs pa'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2907E:302a-41: gsang ba'i lha mo bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2907E:302a-42: mchod pa'i lha mo bzhis mchod pa'i las mdzad du gsol /
T02TD2907E:302a-43: bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyis sems can thams cad re ba bskang ba'i las mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2907E:302a-44: sgo ba bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa dgug gzhug gi las mdzad du gsol la /
T02TD2907E:302a-45: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje dril bu thogs la /
T02TD2907E:302a-46: las kyi phyag rgya bzhin bca' zhing /
T02TD2907E:302a-47: h'um mu dra ma h'a sa lha thams cad zhi ba'i las mdzad du gsol lo //
T02TD2907E:302a-48: kun gyi phrin las gcig yin pas //
T02TD2907E:302a-49: de nas re re ma bshad do //
T02TD2907E:302b-0: mchod pa rgyas par bar 'dir mchod @302b par bya'o //
T02TD2907E:302b-1: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod //
T02TD2907E:302b-2: bcom ldan khro bo gos sngon can //
T02TD2907E:302b-3: yon tan thams cad 'dus pa'i sku //
T02TD2907E:302b-4: rdo rje gram las rnams rdzogs //
T02TD2907E:302b-5: rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-6: bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po ni //
T02TD2907E:302b-7: mthing nag brjid pa'i cha lugs can //
T02TD2907E:302b-8: rdo rje rtse lnga sdigs mdzub 'gyed //
T02TD2907E:302b-9: rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-10: bcom ldan rdo rje phur bu ni //
T02TD2907E:302b-11: ser nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can //
T02TD2907E:302b-12: rdo rje phur bus las rnams mdzad //
T02TD2907E:302b-13: yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-14: bcom ldan rdo rje be con ni //
T02TD2907E:302b-15: dmar nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can /
T02TD2907E:302b-17: dbang sdud sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-18: bcom ldan rdo rje tho ba ni //
T02TD2907E:302b-19: ljang nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can //
T02TD2907E:302b-20: thod sbrul dar gyi rgyan cha can //
T02TD2907E:302b-21: phrin las rdzogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-22: sge mo phreng ba gar dang dbyangs //
T02TD2907E:302b-23: mdzes pa'i me long phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD2907E:302b-24: snyan pa'i pi wang gar sgyur zhing //
T02TD2907E:302b-25: gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-26: bdug pa me tog mar me dri //
T02TD2907E:302b-27: rin chen mdzes pa'i gzhong pa bsnams //
T02TD2907E:302b-29: mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-30: bkra shis lha mo las kyi sku //
T02TD2907E:302b-31: btso ma gser mdog rgyas pa'i sku //
T02TD2907E:302b-32: phyag na bkra shis rdzas brgyad bsnams //
T02TD2907E:302b-33: re skong rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-34: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
T02TD2907E:302b-35: dgug gzhug dgyes pa'i las mdzad ma //
T02TD2907E:302b-36: sgo ba rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-37: tshangs pa brgya byin me yi lha //
T02TD2907E:302b-38: gshin rje srin po chu yi lha //
T02TD2907E:302b-39: rlung lha gnod sbyin bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02TD2907E:302b-40: sa bdag la sogs phyogs skyong bcu //
T02TD2907E:302b-41: lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang //
T02TD2907E:302b-42: mkha'i lding 'dab bzangs lus srul po //
T02TD2907E:302b-44: sde brgyad tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-45: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' la //
T02TD2907E:302b-46: gnas pa'i bgegs rigs stong phrag chos //
T02TD2907E:302b-48: sa gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2907E:302b-49: de nas bsgom zhing bzlas pas bsgrub par bya ste /
T02TD2907E:302b-50: lha rnams rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02TD2907E:303a-0: rdo rje'i lte ba'i h'um la rang rang gi sngags @303a * //
T02TD2907E:303a-1: kyis bskor ba la bzlas pa byas pas /
T02TD2907E:303a-2: sngags kyis lha mo mchod pa dang /
T02TD2907E:303a-5: dngos grub bsdu ba'i las bzhi'i 'phro 'du bya'o //
T02TD2907E:303a-6: de nas thun mtshams su sder bzangs kyi mchod pa dbul te /
T02TD2907E:303a-7: tshe 'dzin zas kyi steng du ni //
T02TD2907E:303a-8: sbrang gi seng ge skyong bzhi gzhag //
T02TD2907E:303a-9: mar gyi tha ma zas kyi bcud //
T02TD2907E:303a-10: bu ram dpag bsam rdzing gi shing //
T02TD2907E:303a-11: lan tshva spod mchog gangs ri spungs //
T02TD2907E:303a-13: bcom ldan rdo rje rnam 'joms la //
T02TD2907E:303a-14: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303a-15: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303a-16: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303a-17: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pe na ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303a-18: zhes lan gsum par du btab par bya'o //
T02TD2907E:303a-19: bcom ldan rdo rje gtum po la //
T02TD2907E:303a-20: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303a-21: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303a-22: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303a-23: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303a-24: bcom ldan rdo rje thugs khyod la //
T02TD2907E:303a-25: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303a-26: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303a-27: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303a-28: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pena ku raksha hi /
T02TD2907E:303a-29: bcom ldan rdo rje phur bu la /
T02TD2907E:303a-30: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303a-31: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303a-32: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303a-33: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303a-34: bcom ldan rdo rje be con la //
T02TD2907E:303a-35: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303a-36: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303a-37: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303a-38: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303a-39: bcom ldan rdo rje tho ba la //
T02TD2907E:303a-40: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303a-41: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303a-42: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303a-43: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303a-45: gsang ba'i lha mo bzhi po la //
T02TD2907E:303a-46: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303a-47: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303a-48: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303a-49: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pe na ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303a-50: rgyas pa'i gru chad ser po la //
T02TD2907E:303a-51: las mdzad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi //
T02TD2907E:303b-0: snying po lnga @303b yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303b-1: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303b-2: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303b-3: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303b-4: 'bar ba'i bar khyams phyogs mtshams brgyad //
T02TD2907E:303b-5: yid 'ong bkra shis lha mo brgyad //
T02TD2907E:303b-6: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303b-7: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303b-8: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303b-9: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303b-10: ye shes las kyi sgo bzhin sa //
T02TD2907E:303b-11: sgom dgug gzhug las mdzad cing //
T02TD2907E:303b-12: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303b-13: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir /
T02TD2907E:303b-14: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303b-15: aom a'a: h'um pa na pem pen ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303b-17: phyogs skyong sde brgyad 'byung po'i tshogs //
T02TD2907E:303b-18: snying po lnga yi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303b-19: tshogs bsags byang chub lam sbyang phyir //
T02TD2907E:303b-20: thugs rjes dgongs nas bzhes su gsol //
T02TD2907E:303b-21: aom gyis nyes pa'i skyon rnams dag / a'a: yis bdud rtsi chen por gyur //
T02TD2907E:303b-22: h'um gis spros te mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:303b-23: pa na pem pen na ku ra ksha kh'a hi /
T02TD2907E:303b-24: phud tsho bcu'i mchod pa 'bul lo //
T02TD2907E:303b-25: de nas nang du 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams la zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gis mchod //
T02TD2907E:303b-26: de nas sgo'i phyi rol 'od kor la /
T02TD2907E:303b-27: 'jig rten pa rnams gtor ma cha gsum gyis mchod /
T02TD2907E:303b-28: dkyil 'khor bris pa'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bslang zhing ye shes phab la /
T02TD2907E:303b-30: rigs kyi bum pa lnga phyogs bzhi dbus dang ldar dgod /
T02TD2907E:303b-31: bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa 'jug pa sgo'i g-yon logs su dgon /
T02TD2907E:303b-32: de rnams lhar bskyed la mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod //
T02TD2907E:303b-33: bsgom zhing bzlas pa'i skabs su //
T02TD2907E:303b-34: bum pa re la snying po brgya rtsa brgyad sngags kyis bskyal lo //
T02TD2907E:303b-35: dang po dkyil 'khor bslang zhing ye shes dbab pa'i bsgrub pa byas la /
T02TD2907E:303b-36: bum pa dgram pa sngon du 'gro ba mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod /
T02TD2907E:303b-37: dkyil 'khor de byin dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2907E:303b-38: rdo rje gzungs kyi sgrub pa byas la /
T02TD2907E:303b-39: lhag chad kyi nyes pa bskang ba rdo rje shugs kyi bsgrub pa bya /
T02TD2907E:303b-40: sku gsungs thugs tha mi dad pa'i bsgrub pa bya /
T02TD2907E:304a-0: dkyil 'khor gyi lha ye shes kyi lha'i @304a * //
T02TD2907E:304a-2: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab ste /
T02TD2907E:304a-4: rtsa ba'i lha bsgom zhing sgrub pa byas te /
T02TD2907E:304a-5: sder bzangs tshogs kyi mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:304a-6: nang du 'jig rten las 'das pa la sbyin sreg gis mchod //
T02TD2907E:304a-7: phyi rol du 'jig rten pa la gtor ma cha gsum gyis mchod la de ltar mchod cing bsgrub pa'i chos bcu gcig la gnas nas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02TD2907E:304a-8: de yang dang po la slob ma lhag gnas kyi dus kyi /
T02TD2907E:304a-9: dbang bskur ba smin pa'i chos bcu po bya /
T02TD2907E:304a-10: slob ma dang po lus khrus byas la slob dpon la gsol pa gdab //
T02TD2907E:304a-11: de nas slob dpon gyis spro ba bskyed /
T02TD2907E:304a-12: slob mas rang gi sdig pa bshags nas sems bskyed //
T02TD2907E:304a-14: lha'i gnas gzhi byin gyis brlab slon ma'i lus lha'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2907E:304a-15: slob dpon gyis de la mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD2907E:304a-16: lha gang la dbang thob pa'i dkyil 'khor du spyan bkab la so shing bskyur //
T02TD2907E:304a-17: dbang la bar chad bskyab phyir srung skud gdags so //
T02TD2907E:304a-18: h'um srung skud sngags kyi byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD2907E:304a-19: lha yi mgul du dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2907E:304a-20: cis kyang mi tshugs mi shigs pa'i //
T02TD2907E:304a-21: rod rje'i dbang mchog thob par shog //
T02TD2907E:304a-22: aom badzra raksha raksha bsrung du gsol lo //
T02TD2907E:304a-23: bar chad cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i rdo rje'i go cha gyon par bsam mo //
T02TD2907E:304a-24: de nas slon dpon ma dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2907E:304a-25: dang po bum pa thogs te 'di skad du //
T02TD2907E:304a-26: bum pa dag byed chos nyid spros bral sku //
T02TD2907E:304a-27: kun gzhi nyon mongs gnas gyur lus dag ste //
T02TD2907E:304a-28: me long lta bu'i ye shes mthar rtogs nas //
T02TD2907E:304a-29: rdo rje rnam 'joms sku ru sangs rgyas shog //
T02TD2907E:304a-30: nam: tsanda badzra aa bhi shi nytsa h'u /
T02TD2907E:304a-31: aom h'um h'um h'um: aa: lan lnga brjod pa gong mas 'gre /
T02TD2907E:304a-32: bum pa chu yi dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2907E:304a-33: lus kyi sgrib pa dag pa ste //
T02TD2907E:304a-34: me long lta bu'i don mchog ni //
T02TD2907E:304a-35: snang la rang bzhin med pa'i don rtogs par gyur cig //
T02TD2907E:304a-36: de nas dbu rgyan thogs la 'di skad do //
T02TD2907E:304a-37: dbu rgyan rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi sku //
T02TD2907E:304a-38: nyon mongs lnga yi gnas ni dag 'gyur te //
T02TD2907E:304a-39: lus kyi sgrib pa dag ste mnyam nyid rtogs //
T02TD2907E:304b-0: rin chen 'byung ldan sku ru @304b sangs rgyas shog //
T02TD2907E:304b-1: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo'i phyag rgya bcas te /
T02TD2907E:304b-2: aom badzra dhva tv'i shva ri ni h'um /
T02TD2907E:304b-3: badzra ni aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02TD2907E:304b-7: aom karma badzra ni h'um aa bhi shi nytsa m'am /
T02TD2907E:304b-8: rigs kyi bu khyod la dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur bas /
T02TD2907E:304b-9: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pas mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs te /
T02TD2907E:304b-10: rin chen 'byung ldan skur sangs rgyas par gyur cig //
T02TD2907E:304b-11: de nas rdo rje thogs la 'di skad do /
T02TD2907E:304b-12: h'um sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD2907E:304b-13: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02TD2907E:304b-14: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02TD2907E:304b-15: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02TD2907E:304b-16: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti aa bhi shi nytsa badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD2907E:304b-17: rigs kyi bu la rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas //
T02TD2907E:304b-18: yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur cing //
T02TD2907E:304b-19: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thob gyur cig //
T02TD2907E:304b-20: de nas ming gi dbang bskur te /
T02TD2907E:304b-21: kye rdo rje kun du bzang po zhes ming btags pas /
T02TD2907E:304b-22: rnam rtog sgo lnga'i dri ma gnas gyur pas /
T02TD2907E:304b-23: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes der rtogs nas //
T02TD2907E:304b-24: ye shes rang gnas kyi dbang thob par gyur cig //
T02TD2907E:304b-25: aom badzra sa tva stvam aa bhi shi nytsa badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD2907E:304b-26: rdo rje ming gi dbang thob pa kho nar gyur cig //
T02TD2907E:304b-27: de nas rdo rje dril bu gnyis ka thogs la /
T02TD2907E:304b-28: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang bskur ba /
T02TD2907E:304b-30: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug //
T02TD2907E:304b-31: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD2907E:304b-32: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD2907E:304b-33: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta si ddhi badzras sa ma ya ti shtha ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi badzras tva hi hi h'um /
T02TD2907E:304b-34: rigs kyi bu khyod la rod rje brtul zhugs kyi dbang bskar bas /
T02TD2907E:304b-35: khyad par byang chub sems dang ldan te /
T02TD2907E:304b-37: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rtogs pa kho nar gyur cig //
T02TD2907E:304b-38: de las slob ma la bkra shis gsol lo //
T02TD2907E:304b-40: skar ma rab rib mar me dang //
T02TD2907E:304b-41: sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang //
T02TD2907E:304b-42: rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu //
T02TD2907E:304b-45: sa ma ya tra ta ces /
T02TD2907E:304b-46: dbus nas nub tu kha bltas te zhal bsum mo //
T02TD2907E:304b-47: rim par brtsams pas bdag nyid dga' //
T02TD2907E:304b-48: shes par byas pas sum la sgron //
T02TD2907E:305a-2: bdag pas dman la phan phyir brtsams //
T02TD2907E:305a-3: 'di yis bsod nams gong thob pa //
T02TD2907E:305a-4: rnam 'joms sku yi zhal mthong shog //
T02TD2907E:305a-5: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dga' ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba zhes bya ba rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2907E:305a-8: // / bod kyi lo ts'a ba spu rangs bsod nams blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhugs te gtan la phab ba'o//
